title: GAMCO Adds to Research and Portfolio Management Team

text:
RYE, N.Y.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- GAMCO Investors, Inc. (“GAMCO” or the “Company”) (NYSE:GBL) today announced the addition of the following teammates to its research and portfolio management process:
Analyst/PM
Coverage Area
G. Anthony Bancroft
Environmental/Aerospace
Sergey Dluzhevskiy, CFA
Telecom
Sarah Donnelly
Consumer Staples
Jose Garza
Industrials
A. Carolina Jolly, CFA
Automotive Aftermarket
Chong-Min Kang
Global Equities
Brian Sponheimer
Automotive & Capital Equipment
Adam Trivison
Gaming & Lodging/Payment Technologies
Jennie Tsai
Medical Devices
Timothy M. Winter, CFA
Utilities
Sara Wojda
Diagnostics
ABOUT GAMCO INVESTORS, INC.
GAMCO Investors, Inc., through its subsidiaries, manages private advisory accounts (GAMCO Asset Management Inc.) and mutual funds and closed-end funds (Gabelli Funds, LLC). As of December 31, 2017, GAMCO had $43.1 billion in assets under management.
